text: (hutu napiyutaiya) makkalukku ivvulaka valkkaiyin cukapokankalai nam kotuttiruntum avarkalutaiya talaivarkal (avarraiyum) avaraiyum nirakarittuvittu marumaiyaic cantippataiyum poyyakki (‘hutu' napiyai cuttik kanpittu) ‘‘ivar unkalaip ponra oru manitane tavira verillai. Ninkal pucippataiye avarum pucikkirar; ninkal kutippataiye avarum kutikkirar
